alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Howell; Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 23 at 7:08PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WRIGHT...NORTHEASTERN DOUGLAS...NORTHERN HOWELL AND SOUTHERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 708 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Raymondville, or 11 miles southeast of Houston, moving east at 55 mph.Additional storms were located near Ava. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain Grove, Willow Springs, Cabool, Norwood, Summersville, Brushyknob, Arroll, Elk Creek, Eunice, Yukon, Hartshorn, Vanzant, Clear Springs, Solo, Pine Crest, Simmons and Drury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
